summary: THERE ARE CONTINUED REPEATED INTERMITTENT FAILURES OF THE ABS CONTROL MODULE THUS RENDERING THE ENTIRE BRAKING SYSTEM AND TRACTION CONTROL SYSTEM AS UNRELIABLE.  THE INCIDENTS HAPPEN QUITE FREQUENTLY AND OFTEN APPEAR RELATED TO THE AMBIENT AIR TEMPERATURE.  I HAVE HAD MY MECHANICS REPLACE MULTIPLE WHEEL BEARINGS AND CLEAR OVER 30 CODES RELATED TO THE  FAILURE OF THIS COMPONENT.  THIS IS BASICALLY RENDERING MY VEHICLE AS A SIGNIFICANT SAFETY RISK FOR ME AND MY FAMILY.  *TR
